PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-01752013-02-28,  ,  AANDC,  ,  , 
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectSettlement of specific claims with claimant First Nations
PrecisOrder increasing the monetary authority of the Minister of Indian Affairs and Northern Development to enter into SPECIFIC CLAIM SETTLEMENT AGREEMENTS with FIRST NATIONS on behalf of Her Majesty in right of Canada and where a PROVINCE and/or TERRITORY is involved from $7 million to $50 million provided the settlement does not include a contemporaneous transfer of an interest in land or the setting apart of land as reserve.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
